policy.name: s3_access_control_lists
policy.description: Validate permissions on S3 buckets to ensure they are not exposing the contents to the general public

Buckets.name: Buckets should not be open to the public. Checks for permissions granted to AWS predefined public groups

READ.background: This group represents all AWS accounts. Access permission to this group allows any AWS account to access the resource. However, all requests must be signed (authenticated)

READ.name: READ
path: Item mapping to S3Buckets,S3Buckets,new-demo-env-config should contain the defined values
READ.background: Access permission to this group allows anyone to access the resource. The requests can be signed (authenticated) or unsigned (anonymous). Unsigned requests omit the Authentication header in the request

WRITE.background: This group represents all AWS accounts. Access permission to this group allows any AWS account to access the resource. However, all requests must be signed (authenticated)

WRITE.name: WRITE
path: Buckets should not be open to the public. Checks for permissions granted to AWS predefined public groups
WRITE.background: Access permission to this group allows anyone to access the resource. The requests can be signed (authenticated) or unsigned (anonymous). Unsigned requests omit the Authentication header in the request

READ_ACP.background: This group represents all AWS accounts. Access permission to this group allows any AWS account to access the resource. However, all requests must be signed (authenticated)

READ_ACP.name: READ_ACP
path: Item mapping to S3,Buckets,* should contain the defined values
READ_ACP.background: Access permission to this group allows anyone to access the resource. The requests can be signed (authenticated) or unsigned (anonymous). Unsigned requests omit the Authentication header in the request

WRITE_ACP.background: This group represents all AWS accounts. Access permission to this group allows any AWS account to access the resource. However, all requests must be signed (authenticated)

WRITE_ACP.name: WRITE_ACP
path: Buckets should not be open to the public. Checks for permissions granted to AWS predefined public groups
WRITE_ACP.background: Access permission to this group allows anyone to access the resource. The requests can be signed (authenticated) or unsigned (anonymous). Unsigned requests omit the Authentication header in the request
